Interface Radio


  • public interface Radio
    Defines all the methods that a Radio should have.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getFrequency()
      Get the current frequency.
      double getSavedStation(int position)
      Get a saved station on the favorites array
      double getStation()
      Get the current station selected.
      boolean isOn()
      Get the current state of the radio.
      void nextStation(boolean frequency)
      Move forward into the station dial.
      void prevStation(boolean frequency)
      Move backwards into the station dial.
      void saveStation(int position, double station)
      Save a station on the favorites array.
      void switchAMFM()
      Switch the frequency selected.
      void turnOnOff()
      Switch the on state of the Radio.

    • Method Detail

      • isOn

        boolean isOn()
        Get the current state of the radio.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if the Radio is on.

      • turnOnOff

        void turnOnOff()
        Switch the on state of the Radio.

      • nextStation

        void nextStation(boolean frequency)
        Move forward into the station dial.
        Parameters:
        frequency - boolean indicating if the frequency is AM or FM. true = AM

      • prevStation

        void prevStation(boolean frequency)
        Move backwards into the station dial.
        Parameters:
        frequency - boolean indicating if the frequency is AM or FM. true = AM.

      • getStation

        double getStation()
        Get the current station selected.
        Returns:
        double indicating the current station selected.

      • saveStation

        void saveStation(int position,
                 double station)
        Save a station on the favorites array.
        Parameters:
        position - index indicating where to store the station.
        station - double indicating the station.

      • getSavedStation

        double getSavedStation(int position)
        Get a saved station on the favorites array
        Parameters:
        position - index indicating which station to pick.

      • getFrequency

        boolean getFrequency()
        Get the current frequency. And also save it as the current station.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if it is AM or FM. true = AM.

      • switchAMFM

        void switchAMFM()
        Switch the frequency selected.
